main event: On July 20, 1963, a witness in Fairborn, Ohio, observed an unidentified flying object that hovered and suddenly darted upward at high speed.
interesting points: The object appeared to hover for about 3-5 minutes before moving rapidly towards the east., The report noted that this was either early warning or intelligence activity., The witness's wife and son also reported seeing the object., The object was compared to the echo and movement of the moon or sun seen in daylight., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes.
witness description: the witness's wife, son, and a friend across the way
